name: Khaos (IManticoreX)
description:
Play as Titan Hyperion in his attempt at escaping the dark abyss of Khoas and beat the cruel Zeus. Are you able to beat this challenging game? 

Story:

Zeus betrayed you and your fellow Olympians. You were banished to Tartarus(hell but worse)and thrown in the dark abyss of Khaos. Now you try to escape Khaos and get your revenge. Good luck.

How to Play:

-To manage the spinning jetpack press the a and d buttons or the arrowKeys

-Aim and shoot the gun with the mouse

-The only way to kill pumpkins is to do a charged attack which can be triggered by holding the mouse button down

*Note the Quit button doesn't work because it is played in the browser. My apologies.  Use the escape button as an alternative.
